DOC.brief_summary: Using patients receiving spinal anesthesia as a model to evaluate the treshold value of cerebral oximeter to detect the symptoms of cerebral ischemia
DOC.brief_title: The Threshold Value of Regional Cerebral Oxygenation in Detecting Cerebral Ischemia
DOC.detailed_description: 56 patients has been recruited for the analysis of relationship between the symptoms of cerebral ischemia and the value of cerebral oximeter. All patients were recieved spinal anesthesia for the procedure of Ceserean section.
DOC.criteria: patients who are going to undergo Cesarean section under spinal anesthesia conditons contraindicated for regional anesthesia
